org.xbib.elasticsearch.river.jdbc.strategy.simple

Class SimpleRiverSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xbib.elasticsearch.river.jdbc.strategy.simple.SimpleRiverSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RiverSource
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OneShotRiverSource, TableRiverSource

    public class SimpleRiverSource
extends Object
implements RiverSource
    A river source implementation for the 'simple' strategy.

    It connects to a JDCC database, fetches from it by using a merge method provided by the river task. It does not process acknowledgements from the river target side.

    The river source understands all the JDBC column types and parses them to an appropriate Java object.

    Author:
    JÃ¶rg Prante
